targets.query: SELECT mean("wind_chill") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "weatherflow_obs" WHERE ("collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/ AND "station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("delta_t") + mean("wet_bulb_temperature") * 9/5 + 32 FROM "weatherflow_obs" WHERE ("collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/ AND "station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
